keywords: Fried chicken,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Fried Chicken Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 piece chicken maryland (whole leg: thigh & drumstick)

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, salt and five spice powder in a saucepan, cover with water and bring to boil. Then simmer until chicken is cooked but firm.
Remove the chicken from stock, drain and dry.
Heat oil in wok, deep-fry chicken until crisp and golden.
Boil chicken stock in a saucepan.
Cook noodles as per package instructions. Cut shallots and lettuce.
Place noodles into each bowl, lettuce, shallots and stock to cover the noodles.
To serve, place chicken on top.
